titleStmt.title: A learned sermon of the nature of pride, by Richard Hooker, sometimes fellow of Corpus Christi College in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Richard, 1553 or 4-1600.
Jackson, Henry, 1586-1662.
Spenser, John, 1559-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold by John Barnes dwelling neere Holborne Conduit [, London],

notesStmt.note: Edited by Henry Jackson under the direction of John Spenser (DNB, under Jackson).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
